text: Black Box is a French film co-written and directed by Yann Gozlan, released in 2021.Boîte noire == Synopsis == Mathieu Vasseur, ENAC graduate aeronautical engineer, technician at the authority responsible for safety investigations in civil aviation, must find out why the plane covering the Dubai-Paris flight crashed in the Alps. Black box analysis makes him think beyond a human error or technical malfunction and secretly investigate to dig deeper into a highly suspicious case. == Distribution == * Pierre Niney: Mathieu Vasseur * Lou de Laage: Noémie Vasseur * André Dussollier: Philippe Rénier * Sébastien Pouderoux: Xavier Renaud * Olivier Rabourdin: Victor Pollock * Guillaume Marquet: Antoine Balsan * Mehdi Djaadi: Samir * Anne Azoulay: Caroline Delmas * Aurélien Recoing: Claude Varins * André Marcon: Dorval * Philippe Maymat: Captain * Quentin d'Hainaut: the guard * Lorène Devienne: Jeanne, the flight attendant * Grégori Derangère: Alain Roussin == Anecdote == For the reception scene organized by ENAC Alumni, the film team called on real graduates of the French Civil Aviation University.Recherche figurants pour le Film de Yann Gozlan « La Boîte Noire » avec Pierre Niney et André Dussollier ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2020s French-language movies Category:Movies set in Paris
title: Black Box (2021 movie)
